action_required.description: 22 interactive UI components (modals, dropdowns, theme variants) were not captured in visual regression testing due to mock API limitations and complex interaction requirements.
action_required.recommendation: Manual visual inspection recommended for: credential/source/scan modals, dropdown menus, and dark theme variant.

action_required.description: 9 pre-existing react/display-name ESLint errors in vendor react-table-batteries code.
action_required.recommendation: These existed before migration and are not caused by the PF5→PF6 upgrade. No action needed unless vendor code is updated.

action_required.description: Kantra static analysis validation was skipped due to system container runtime permissions issue.
action_required.recommendation: If container runtime is fixed, run: kantra analyze --input ./quipucords-ui --output ./workdir/kantra-final --provider nodejs --source patternfly-v5 --target patternfly-v6 --rules ./rulesets --enable-default-rulesets

groups.name: Group 1: Deprecated Select Components
groups.description: PF6 removed Select/SelectOption/SelectVariant from deprecated exports. Rewrote SelectFilterControl and MultiselectFilterControl to use PF6 composable Select + MenuToggle + SelectList + SelectOption.

groups.name: Group 2: OptionPropsWithKey Type Updates
groups.description: Type interface changed when Select was replaced. Redefined OptionPropsWithKey with own properties instead of extending SelectOptionProps.

groups.name: Group 4: CSS Class Prefix Updates
groups.description: All pf-v5 CSS class references updated to pf-v6 across source files.

groups.name: Group 5: Test Fixes
groups.description: Updated snapshots, class selectors, and toolbar interaction tests. 35+ snapshot tests updated for pf-v5 → pf-v6 class names.

groups.name: Group 6: ESLint False Positive Suppression
groups.description: ESLint import/named rule can't resolve PF6 exports through CSS module chain. Added eslint-disable comments on ~20 files. Types verified via tsc --noEmit (0 errors).
